name: lettercraft
description: Lettercraft & Epistolary Performance in Medieval Europe
author: UU Centre for Digital Humanities - Research Software Lab

scripts.test-back: yarn back python -m pytest && yarn back python manage.py test
scripts.start-back: cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings glue --pythonpath ..
scripts.livereload-back: cd backend && python manage.py livereload --settings glue --pythonpath ..
scripts.start: yarn start-front & yarn start-back & yarn watch-back & yarn codegen
scripts.collectstatic-p: cd backend && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput -v 0 --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.static-p: yarn build && yarn clean-static && yarn collectstatic-p
scripts.start-back-p: cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings production --insecure --pythonpath ..
scripts.start-p: yarn static-p && yarn watch-front-p & yarn start-back-p
scripts.codegen-once: yarn start-back & yarn front yarn graphql-codegen && yarn stop-back
